issue.title: facebook.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [http://facebook.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Ffacebook.com) ### Comment Username: @Kazak88 > So when using Facebook in mobile browser eg Samsung internet, it puts a banner in bottom of screen to make one use Facebook lite app. Is there a way to get rid of this banner. Also Adguard stopped blocking sponsored posts on Facebook. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/n17woule3yss0g480sg0o4w0sssw4gocs3grr6btzc.jpg?nc=1)
